description: The fields offered when creating the subject's, and the categories for each of the subjects, and when adding a grade to a subject, and assigning it to a category of that subject are very limited, and there isn't any way to include more thorough information, or data that is incorporated into the grade your wanting to keep track of available, which leaves the app with the lack of ability to customize to track your grade the way you want, or need to, and you can't personalize much of how it comes up with getting the total of your subject grade other than the percentage given to the categories of each subject representing the portion of the subject grade each of the subject's categories would be worth, and counting as a part of the subject's overall grade.
summary: There isn't enough fields for information to be added to

description: It does what is says.but why isnt there an option to remove categories?
